content: my best remembrance poppy pattern by caroline spillane i love knitting flowers and the remembrance poppy is my favourite i have knitted hundreds and hundreds for the royal british legion poppy appeal i like to the look of separate petals but find them time consuming to make so i have designed which gives the illusion of petals but is knitted in one piece the centre is knitted separately it is very quick to do alternatively you could use a button the poppy measures approx 3 inches across/8cms this poppy has been knitted in sparkle glamourous yarn from b&m it is a 150g ball for £2 99 materials abbreviations approx 20g red dk yarn ktbl increase 1 st by knitting into the front and back scrap of black dk yarn or a button of the loop scraps for leaf green yarn ktog knit 2 stitches together to decrease brooch back k knit 3 25mm knitting needles us 3 p purl special notes 1 on row 7 you need to twist the stitches on the left hand needle one full turn every 7 stitches to twist turn all the stitches the left needle one full turn around the needle away from you then continue to knit the next stitch in the normal way this twist will help make the flower look like it had individual petals see the last page of the pattern for a full explanation of the twist 2 for row 8 you need to increase by knitting into the front and back of the stitch kf&b where stated poppy cast on 56 stitches using cable cast on row 1-6 knit row 7 see special note 1 k7 twist to last 7 stitches knit to end row 8 k6 kfb twice k5 kfb twice to last 6 stitches knit to end 70 sts row 9 knit row 10 knit row 11 k2 k2tog to last 2sts k2 53 sts row 12 k1 k2tog to last 2 sts k2 36 sts row 13 k2 decrease to end 18 sts row 14 k2 decrease to end 9 sts row 15 k2 decrease twice k1 k2 decrease twice 5 sts row 16 k2 decrease k1 k2 decrease 3 sts cut yarn leaving enough to sew up the poppy thread through the remaining 3 stitches and pull tight sew the two sides of the knitting together forming a circle i fold one edge slightly to get a bump similar to the rest of the petals © caroline spillane c spillane@sky com knitting rules ok poppy centre cast on 14 sts with black yarn row 1-3 knit row 4 k2 decrease 7 sts row 5 k2 decrease to last stitch k1 4 sts row 6 k2 decrease twice cut yarn leaving a tail to sew up thread through remaining stitches and pull tight sew into a disc shape and fasten_off leaf using green yarn cast on 2 stitches row 1 purl row2 rs kfbl twice 4sts row3 purl row 4 kfbl k2 kfbl 6 sts
